name: Cosmic Casino
description:
In Cosmic Casino players take on the role of an intergalactic gambler, traveling to different casinos throughout the galaxy to play poker and collect powerful cards. The game combines elements of a roguelike, idle, clicker, and deck builder game to create a unique and engaging experience.

The game takes place in a vibrant and colorful galaxy filled with strange and exotic aliens. Players start with a basic deck of cards and must use their poker skills to win matches and unlock new cards. Each casino has its own set of challenges and unique rewards, making every playthrough a new and exciting experience.

Players can choose to play actively or passively, with idle and clicker mechanics allowing them to earn currency even when they're not actively playing. They can also strategize their deck-building, trying to create powerful card combinations that will help them conquer even the toughest opponents.

As players progress through the game, they'll unlock new abilities and bonuses that will make them even more powerful. But they'll also face greater challenges, including legendary alien poker champions that will put their skills to the ultimate test.

With addictive gameplay, stunning visuals, and a vast galaxy to explore, Cosmic Casino is sure to be a hit with fans of roguelikes, idle games, and poker alike. Will you have what it takes to become the ultimate galactic gambler?
